title: Going to the Super Bowl
description: This informational text tells all about one of America's favorite championship games: the Super Bowl. The author explains how the famous football game began, how it got its name, and how it's changed through the years. Also included is a collection of game highlights, complete with a timeline of "Super Moments in Super Bowl History."
meta: civic, dynasty, festivities, interception, merge, root, spectacle, trounced, underdog
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Quotation Marks : Understand the use of quotation marks in text

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
